title: Authentication details
description: Authentication details properties specific to Adobe Primetime Authentication flows.

xdm:idp.title: MVPD Identifier
xdm:idp.description: The MVPD with whom the end user is authenticated or tries to authenticate

xdm:technologyProvider.title: Technology Provider
xdm:technologyProvider.description: The partner which provides the infrastructure for IdP authentication endpoints

xdm:broker.title: Authentication Broker
xdm:broker.description: External authentication provider which might intermediate the authentication flow

meta:enum.passive: Passive authentication method reusing the same user agent
meta:enum.idpInitiated: The authentication flow was initiated by the Idp

xdm:relayState.title: Relay State
xdm:relayState.description: Relay state information used during authentication flow

xdm:timeToLive.title: Time To Live
xdm:timeToLive.description: Authentication token time to live in seconds.

meta:enum.unsupported: The authentication method is not supported
